item.description: Enable this option to activate the InfoBar Timers screen.
Enable this option to activate the InfoBar Timers screen in MoviePlayer.
Set to 'Yes' to add the 'Show Timers' option to the Extension menu.
Set to 'Yes' to add the 'InfoBarTimers Setup' option to the Extension menu.
Select the format for duration, elapsed and remaining time displays. Not all skins used the user configurable time displays.
Select the type of label to be displayed in front of the signal values.
Select the type of separator to be displayed between the signal display label and the signal values.
Set the left, top position (in pixels) of the InfoBar Timers overlay.
Select from the available style choices offered by the current skin. Not all skins will have alternative styles.
Set the maximum number of entries in the InfoBar Timers overlay. The number of entries displayed may be reduced if there is insufficient screen space.
Select the display order of the various timer entries (Waiting / Active / Done) in the InfoBar.
Select the sort order for the start time of the various timer entries in the InfoBar.
Select the maximum number of completed timers to be listed in the InfoBar.
Select the maximum number of upcoming timers to be listed in the InfoBar.
Select the maximum number of disabled timers to be listed in the InfoBar.

Select how frequently the InfoBar Timers overlay updates its list. The refresh timer ranges from 0 to 60 seconds. A value of 0 disables the timer. Refreshing is only appropriate if the InfoBar stays visible for extended periods of time.
Select the display order of the various timer entries (Waiting / Active / Done) in the Show screen.
Select the sort order for the start time of the various timer entries in the Show screen.
Select the maximum number of completed timers to be listed in the Show screen. A value of -1 means to display ALL available entries.
Select the maximum number of upcoming timers to be listed in the Show screen. A value of -1 means to display ALL available entries.
Select the maximum number of disabled timers to be listed in the Show screen.
Select how frequently the 'Show Timers' screen updates its list. The refresh delay ranges from 0 to 60 seconds. A value of 0 disables the refresh.

item.text: Use InfoBar timer list in Show
item.description: Select 'Yes' to display the same timer list in the Show screen as used in the Overlay InfoBar. Selecting 'No' will display all available timers in the Show screen.
